item.description: Tickets are on sale now through April 26th. You can purchase them at www.like-no-udder.com/aboutus.html and are a very reasonable $16.50 each. Menu items include tofu scramble, peach bread pudding, tempeh sausage, cornbread and gravy and more. The event may be combined with other things, such as one of the World Vegan Bake Sale Day events and a free optional Laughter Yoga Class to honor World Laughter Day. Details will be posted on the Like No Udder website as they solidify. Looking forward to seeing you there and please help spread the word.
item.why: Let's turn this RI tradition around and share delicious vegan eats with like minded people. Hosted by the owners of Like No Udder, this is the follow up event to last year's sold out Vegan Holiday Meal.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Attend the First Annual Vegan May Brunch in Providence
